se.fredin.gravitation.entity.physical

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.fredin.gravitation.entity.AbstractEntity
      • se.fredin.gravitation.entity.physical.PhysicalEntity
        • se.fredin.gravitation.entity.physical.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Entity

    public class Player
extends PhysicalEntity
    Class that handles the player, also contains a nested class for gamepads and a touchpad for android/ios
    Author:
    johan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Player.GamePad
      Nested class for getting a gamepad controller to the player

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(float xPos,
      float yPos,
      java.lang.String texturePath,
      com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
      float bodyWidth,
      float bodyHeight,
      int PLAYER_NUM,
      GameMode gameMode)
        Creates a new player instance
        Parameters:
        xPos - the x position of the player
        yPos - the y position of the player
        texturePath - the path to the texture used for the sprite
        world - the box2D world this player will live in
        bodyWidth - the width of the player
        bodyHeight - the height of the player
        PLAYER_NUM - the number of the player (1 or 2)
        gameMode - the current game mode

      • die

        public void die(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 spawnPoint)
        When player dies this should be called. Stops the players sound, resets position of the player and creates an explosion particle effect
        Parameters:
        spawnPoint - the spawnpoint on which the player will be transfered to

      • checkForCollision
